name: CCP_GOAL_BARRIER
description: This table contains data on the barrier associated with each goal.

columns.name: GOAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the goal record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: BARRIER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the barriers associated with this record.
